{{Infobox Radio station | name = WLVU | image = [[File:KLOVE.jpg|200px]] | city = [[Halifax, Pennsylvania|Halifax]], [[Pennsylvania]] | area = | slogan = positive, encouraging | branding = ''K-LOVE'' | frequency = 88.5 [[MHz]] | repeater = | airdate = | format = [[Contemporary Christian]] | erp = 1,400 [[watt]]s | haat = {{convert|108.0|m|ft|sp=us}} | class = A | facility_id = 91925 | coordinates = {{coord|40|27|26.00|N|76|54|13.00|W|region:US_type:city|display=inline,title}} | callsign_meaning = | former_callsigns = WWWH (2005-2006)
WMBZ (2006-2007) | owner = [[Educational Media Foundation]] | licensee = | sister_stations = | webcast = {{listen live|http://www.klove.com}} | website = [http://www.klove.com klove.com] | affiliations = }} '''WLVU''' (88.5 [[FM broadcasting|FM]], "K-LOVE") is a [[radio station]] broadcasting a [[contemporary Christian music]] format.{{cite web |url=http://www.arbitron.com |date=Spring 2010 |title=Station Information Profile |publisher=[[Arbitron]] |accessdate=2010-04-04}} Licensed to [[Halifax, Pennsylvania]], USA, the station is currently owned by [[Educational Media Foundation]].{{cite web |url=http://www.fcc.gov/fcc-bin/fmq?call=WLVU |title=WLVU Facility Record |work=United States [[Federal Communications Commission]], audio division |accessdate=2010-04-04}} ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * {{official|http://www.klove.com}} * {{FM station data|WLVU}} {{K-LOVE}} [[Category:Christian contemporary radio stations]] [[Category:Radio stations in Pennsylvania|LVU]] [[Category:Dauphin County, Pennsylvania]] [[Category:K-LOVE radio stations]] {{Pennsylvania-radio-station-stub}}
